name: Gado-gado
description: Indonesian peanut sauce salad with mixed vegetables and tofu
steps: [{"description":"Goreng kacang tanah, haluskan untuk bumbu","position":0},{"description":"Rebus kangkung, tauge, dan kentang","position":1},{"description":"Goreng tahu dan tempe hingga kecokelatan","position":2},{"description":"Siram sayuran dengan bumbu kacang","position":3}]

name: Nasi Goreng
description: Classic Indonesian fried rice with sweet soy sauce and sambal
steps: [{"description":"Panaskan minyak goreng di wajan","position":0},{"description":"Tumis bawang putih dan bawang merah hingga harum","position":1},{"description":"Masukkan nasi putih, aduk rata","position":2},{"description":"Tambahkan kecap manis dan garam, aduk hingga merata","position":3},{"description":"Goreng telur di samping, sajikan di atas nasi","position":4}]

name: Soto Ayam
description: Indonesian chicken soup with turmeric, lemongrass, and glass noodles
steps: [{"description":"Rebus ayam dengan air, kunyit, serai, dan daun jeruk","position":0},{"description":"Angkat ayam, suwir-suwir dagingnya","position":1},{"description":"Saring kaldu, masukkan kembali ayam suwir","position":2},{"description":"Rebus soun hingga lunak, tiriskan","position":3},{"description":"Sajikan kaldu dengan soun dan ayam suwir","position":4}]
